feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Failed foreign key constraint check due to daily_video 0 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16798
  • fix: Revert "feat: Update UI of signup / login pages (#16710)" by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16801
  • chore: Release v4.5.5 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16804

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.4...v4.5.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: small changes to license page by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16812
  • fix: OOO issue with setting the start and end dates to the same by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16810
  • feat: Improve API v2 docs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16818
  • chore: Replace campsite.co with campsite.com by @nholden in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16819
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16813
  • fix: selected calendars atom deselect calendar by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16825
  • chore: bump slots rate limit by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16826
  • fix: platform cancel booking webhook not triggered by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16827
  • chore: Allow redirecting /docs to external docs solution by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16836
  • feat: Add hideCalendarEventDetails option to event types by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16817
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16839
  • chore: v4.5.6 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16837

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.5...v4.5.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: New UI for SignUp / Login by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16802
  • feat: adding Bolna Voice AI integration for cal.com by @prateeksachan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16828
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16843
  • chore: v4.5.7 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16848

New Contributors

  • @prateeksachan made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16828

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.6...v4.5.7

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: is not clickable cause of z-index by @ymohit1603 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16842
  • fix: insights UI/UX by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16610
  • fix: Don't AutoScroll to embed when multiple-duration event's booking page is embedded by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16411
  • fix: add teamId to platform urls by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16852
  • feat: Forward all the page params to embed by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16330
  • docs: v2 event-types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16854
  • chore: Move getRemindersFromRemovedTeams and deleteAllWorkflowReminders to workflow repo by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16861
  • fix: TODO in AppCard.tsx by @Priyansh1547 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16863
  • fix: spacing in signup by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16850
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16851
  • fix: hydration error coming from useLastUsed hook by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16876
  • refactor: event recurring web wrapper by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16764
  • refactor: event availability web wrapper by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16808
  • refactor: event advanced web wrapper by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16711
  • refactor: enable infinite scrolling for all by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16463
  • feat: Event Type Atom base pr by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16831
  • chore: refactor billing service v2 by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16805
  • feat: frontend to handle multiple calendars for connect atoms by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16527
  • fix: multiple calendars atom tooltip by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16883
  • feat: stripe connect atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16190
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16884
  • fix: undefined in meeting url workflow variable by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16771
  • fix: over-fetching data in workflows when getting all workflows for eventtype by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16879
  • feat: prevent sending multiple instant meeting request by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16881
  • fix: conditional check for oAuth client ID by @cfex in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16809
  • chore: (1) settings/security - remove pages router and use app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16795
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16886
  • chore: add saml signup test / improve signup e2e test by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16849
  • fix: theme is not configured in app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16889
  • chore: improve event-type atom desc, data fetch by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16890
  • feat: v2 rate limiting by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16882
  • chore: Couple fixes to improve error reporting by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16895
  • feat: added workflows to all actions by @krakenftw in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16691
  • fix: booker atom recurring event by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16719
  • chore: Release v4.5.8 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16896

New Contributors

  • @Priyansh1547 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16863
  • @cfex made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16809
  • @krakenftw made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16691

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.7...v4.5.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: improve instrumentation deps by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16899
  • fix: Better defaulting to NEXT_PUBLIC_LOGGER_LEVEL=4 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16900
  • docs: v2 refresh tokens and slots endpoints swagger by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16788
  • fix: fix ui overflow on phone for calendar settings by @mhetreayush in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16661
  • refactor: handleNewBooking #4 by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15673
  • chore: refactor shell to individual files by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16893
  • fix: translations for sidebar by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16910
  • feat: Multiple Private links per Event Type by @Souptik2001 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15896
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16911
  • fix: i18n for app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16909
  • feat: add Mintlify docs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16787
  • fix: Tooltip must be used within TooltipProvider by @muhammadspace in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16918
  • chore: v4.5.9 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16926

New Contributors

  • @muhammadspace made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16918

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.8...v4.5.9
